Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Looks like we don't need to waste our time here.", 4: '1'}
{2: "If it's a river, there must be a source.", 3: '14', 4: "If it's an organism, there must be a heart.", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'So before we reach the limit of our comms...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Phew... Looks like I don't have to remind you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He quickly glances at you and breathes a sigh of relief.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Searching for the source of the Red Tide? Got it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I trust your judgment. I'll tell Lucia and Liv.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm not sure how much time I can buy you. Come back ASAP before your protective device reaches its limit.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Even if we don't know what awaits us there."}
